Subject: Logs retention
Description: Hi, Where can I see for how long logs will be collected and can I decide which types of logs should the EPP save?, For example if I want to stop collecting device logs.
What_We_Know__c: The customer asked us how to check the log retention on the server and how to keep 1 year of logs in the server
Next_Steps__c: I provided the steps to enable the Audit log backup
